amendment.description: Amendment prevents future use of the airfield at NASJRB Willow Grove, Pennsylvania, for commercial passenger operations; commercial cargo operations; commercial, business, or nongovernment aircraft operations not related to missions of the installation; and as a reliever airport to relieve congestion at other airports.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in House Report 110-666 to prevent future use of the airfield at NASJRB Willow Grove, Pennsylvania, for commercial passenger operations; commercial cargo operations; commercial, business, or nongovernment aircraft operations not related to missions of the installation; and as a reliever airport to relieve congestion at other airports.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schwartz amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Ms. Schwartz.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schwartz amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
